languages.text: В колонию прибыли проповедники, служащие династии Чорда. Они выступают перед чернью с яростной агитацией, но, к сожалению, представители планетарных властей слишком часто становятся примерами грешного поведения в их речах. Это рождает смуту среди простонародья.

Preachers, in the service of House Chorda, have arrived in the colony. They agitate fiercely before the mob, but, unfortunately, the planet's officials too often serve as examples of reprobate behaviour in their sermons, which begets even more turmoil among the common folk.
languages.original_text: В колонию прибыли проповедники, служащие династии Чорда. Они выступают перед чернью с яростной агитацией, но, к сожалению, представители планетарных властей слишком часто становятся примерами грешного поведения в их речах. Это рождает смуту среди простонародья.

traits.locale_text: Preachers in the service of House Chorda have arrived in the colony. They agitate fiercely before the rabble, but, unfortunately, the planet's officials too often serve as examples of sinful behaviour in their sermons, which begets turmoil among the common folk.

Preachers in the service of House Chorda have arrived in the colony. They agitate fiercely before the rabble, but, unfortunately, the planet's officials too often serve as examples of sinful behaviour in their sermons, which begets turmoil among the common folk.

Preachers, in the service of House Chorda, have arrived in the colony. They agitate fiercely before the mob, but, unfortunately, the planet's officials too often serve as examples of reprobate behaviour in their sermons, which begets even more turmoil among the common folk.

languages.text: Predicadores al servicio de la casa Chorda han llegado a la colonia. Agitan vehementemente a la plebe pero, lamentablemente, usan con frecuencia a los funcionarios del planeta como ejemplos de conducta blasfema en sus sermones, lo que amplifica el caos entre la gente corriente.
languages.original_text: Preachers, in the service of House Chorda, have arrived in the colony. They agitate fiercely before the mob, but, unfortunately, the planet's officials too often serve as examples of reprobate behaviour in their sermons, which begets even more turmoil among the common folk.

traits.locale_text: Predicadores al servicio de la casa Chorda han llegado a la colonia. Agitan vehementemente a la plebe pero, lamentablemente, usan con frecuencia a los funcionarios del planeta como ejemplos de conducta blasfema en sus sermones, lo que amplifica el caos entre la gente corriente.

languages.text: Des prêcheurs missionnés par la maison Chorda sont arrivés dans la colonie. Ils haranguent la foule avec véhémence, mais le problème est qu'ils citent trop souvent les hauts responsables planétaires en exemples de mauvais croyants, ce qui ne manque pas de susciter des pensées séditieuses parmi le bas peuple.
languages.original_text: Preachers, in the service of House Chorda, have arrived in the colony. They agitate fiercely before the mob, but, unfortunately, the planet's officials too often serve as examples of reprobate behaviour in their sermons, which begets even more turmoil among the common folk.

traits.locale_text: Des prêcheurs missionnés par la maison Chorda sont arrivés dans la colonie. Ils haranguent la foule avec véhémence, mais le problème est qu'ils citent trop souvent les hauts responsables planétaires en exemples de mauvais croyants, ce qui ne manque pas de susciter des pensées séditieuses parmi le bas peuple.

languages.text: 库尔达家族的布道士来到了殖民地，激烈地向民众鼓吹他们的教义。遗憾的是，在他们的布道之中，殖民地的官员常常扮演不道德的反派角色。这样的布道在普通民众中激起了巨大的动荡。
languages.original_text: Preachers, in the service of House Chorda, have arrived in the colony. They agitate fiercely before the mob, but, unfortunately, the planet's officials too often serve as examples of reprobate behaviour in their sermons, which begets even more turmoil among the common folk.

traits.locale_text: 库尔达家族的布道士来到了殖民地，激烈地向民众鼓吹他们的教义。遗憾的是，在他们的布道之中，殖民地的官员常常扮演不道德的反派角色。这样的布道在普通民众中激起了巨大的动荡。

languages.text: チョーダ家に仕えるプリーチャーたちがコロニーに到着した。彼らは暴徒の前で激しい扇動を行った。しかし不幸なことに、彼らの説教のさなかに、この惑星の役人たちがしばしばあまりにも非道な振る舞いの見本を示すために、庶民の間にさらなる混乱を招いている。
languages.original_text: Preachers, in the service of House Chorda, have arrived in the colony. They agitate fiercely before the mob, but, unfortunately, the planet's officials too often serve as examples of reprobate behaviour in their sermons, which begets even more turmoil among the common folk.

traits.locale_text: チョーダ家に仕えるプリーチャーたちがコロニーに到着した。彼らは暴徒の前で激しい扇動を行った。しかし不幸なことに、彼らの説教のさなかに、この惑星の役人たちがしばしばあまりにも非道な振る舞いの見本を示すために、庶民の間にさらなる混乱を招いている。

languages.text: Prediger in Diensten von Haus Chorda sind in der Kolonie eingetroffen. Sie halten vor dem Pöbel leidenschaftliche Predigten, in denen die Beamten des Planeten zu oft als Beispiel für ruchloses Verhalten herhalten müssen. Das stachelt das einfache Volk noch weiter an.
languages.original_text: Preachers, in the service of House Chorda, have arrived in the colony. They agitate fiercely before the mob, but, unfortunately, the planet's officials too often serve as examples of reprobate behaviour in their sermons, which begets even more turmoil among the common folk.

traits.locale_text: Prediger in Diensten von Haus Chorda sind in der Kolonie eingetroffen. Sie halten vor dem Pöbel leidenschaftliche Predigten, in denen die Beamten des Planeten zu oft als Beispiel für ruchloses Verhalten herhalten müssen. Das stachelt das einfache Volk noch weiter an.

languages.text: Chorda Hanesi'nin hizmetindeki vaizler, koloniye varış yaptı. Güruhları hırçınca kışkırtsalar da gezegen yetkilileri vaazlarında geçen sakıncalı davranışların mütemadiyen örneği oluyor, bu da halk arasında kargaşanın daha da yayılmasına olanak sağlıyor.
languages.original_text: Preachers, in the service of House Chorda, have arrived in the colony. They agitate fiercely before the mob, but, unfortunately, the planet's officials too often serve as examples of reprobate behaviour in their sermons, which begets even more turmoil among the common folk.
